name: Phosphoryl fluoride
desc: Phosphoryl fluoride (commonly called phosphorus oxyfluoride) is a compound with the chemical formula POF3. It is a toxic gas.
Solubility:
Reacts with alcohol and acid
soluble in ether and hydrocarbons
Main hazards: Poison, corrosive, can form HF on contact with H2O
Related compounds:
Thiophosphoryl fluoride
Phosphoryl chloride
Phosphorus oxybromide
Phosphorus trifluoride
Phosphorus pentafluoride
